short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides users with the ability to reuse code with built-in storage instead of having to write frequently used code from scratch.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Elevate your coding experience to new heights by embracing a suite of features meticulously crafted to not only amplify your productivity but also enrich your learning endeavors. Immerse yourself in a coding environment that effortlessly streamlines your workflow, empowering you to seamlessly save and organize code snippets with unparalleled ease. Tailored for both seasoned developers and those embarking on their coding journey, our extension emerges as a dynamic learning companion, boasting a sophisticated snippet management system that adapts to your evolving requirements. Revel in the clarity brought by syntax highlighting, meticulously curated for a spectrum of programming languages. Effortlessly share your code with a dedicated copy-to-clipboard button accompanying each snippet, fostering a simplified and efficient collaboration process. Integrate coding practice seamlessly into your daily routine and witness a swift acceleration in your learning curve. Unleash the true potential of your coding sessions with an extension that not only caters to your immediate needs but also propels you toward mastery.
